channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump erupts about Trevor Noah joke linking him to Bill Clinton and Jeffrey Epstein: ‘I can’t speak for Bill, but I have never been to Epstein Island’
item.description: Trevor Noah's savage joke said Trump wants Greenland because "Epstein’s island is gone, he needs a new island to hang out with Bill Clinton."

item.title: ‘The Chinese have invaded us in terms of merchandise’: Mexico and Argentina lead Latin America’s struggles with flood of imports
item.description: Temu averaged 114 million monthly active users in Latin America in the first half of 2025, a 165% increase year-on-year from 2024, Sensor Tower estima...

item.title: ‘No one is illegal on stolen land’: how the Grammys turned into a giant Trump roast and ICE protest
item.description: Even Justin and Hailey Bieber, who don’t normally address American politics, wore protest pins about ICE.

item.title: Europe-wide army is a dumb idea, EU foreign policy chief says: ‘maybe those people haven’t really thought this through practically’
item.description: “If you are already part of NATO then you can’t create a separate army," Kaja Kallas said at a security conference in Norway.

item.title: It’s so cold in Florida that iguanas are falling out of trees
item.description: “I think in South Florida you're going to see iguanas falling from trees, I mean a lot, once it gets under 40 degrees,” Gov. Ron DeSantis said.

item.title: Cboe Volatility Index — the ‘fear gauge’ — jumps with stock-market skid in cards
Disney misses earnings target despite record theme-park revenue
Shareholders aren’t happy about this big oil-and-gas merger
Economic calendar: Wall Street on watch for factory updates and automobile sales
